name: Warrior
description: The bread and butter of any party. Usually just a guy with a sharp piece of metal and a very thick skull.
bonus: Can wear heavy armor without complaining.

name: Rogue
description: A professional shadow-stayer. If you can see them, they're probably about to steal your lunch money.
bonus: Higher chance to 'find' things in other people's pockets.

name: Wizard
description: A glass cannon made of old paper and bad eyesight. Can rewrite reality but will die if a stiff breeze hits them.
bonus: Occasionally remembers where they put their spellbook.

name: Paladin
description: A warrior with a moral compass and way too much shiny metal. Basically a walking tank powered by self-righteousness.
bonus: Naturally glows in the dark (terrible for stealth, great for finding keys).

name: Ranger
description: Likes trees more than people. Prefers to solve problems from a safe distance of exactly 50 paces.
bonus: Can talk to squirrels, though the squirrels rarely have anything helpful to say.
